product_name: Pearl Izumi syncroFloat IV Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A stability shoe with plenty of cushioning, the Pearl Izumi syncroFloat(TM) IV women's road-running shoes are built to handle high-mileage training without weighing you down. Half-length medial posts add structure and stability to help correct mild pronation. Seamless woven polyester mesh uppers offer a fantastic, flexible fit with excellent breathability; thermoplastic urethane overlays offer support and structure. Washable, removable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles supply amazing step-in comfort and long-lasting cushioning. EVA midsoles feature forefoot and heel pads for shock absorption and energy return; thermoplastic urethane midfoot shanks provide support and stability. Outsoles use blown rubber in the forefoot and carbon rubber in the heel for durable, reliable traction. The Pearl Izumi syncroFloat IV women's road-running shoes are built on the Pearl Izumi training shoe last to fit comfortably during daily use. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: A stability shoe with plenty of cushioning, the Pearl Izumi syncroFloat(TM) IV women's road-running shoes are built to handle high-mileage training without weighing you down.
